title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Get started with the fundamentals of the C programming language. Learn about variables, loops, and functions.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Explore the world of algorithms and their applications. Understand sorting, searching, and graph algorithms.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Learn C++ programming in the context of Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA). Covers pointers, linked lists, and trees.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Master the fundamental data structures, including arrays, stacks, queues, and linked lists.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Dive into object-oriented programming (OOP) using Python. Learn about classes, objects, and inheritance.

title: Software Engineering
description: Explore the principles and practices of software engineering. Covers development methodologies and project management.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Learn about Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing. Understand cloud infrastructure and services.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Discover the basics of MySQL databases. Covers database design, SQL queries, and data manipulation.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Enhance your problem-solving skills. Explore algorithmic problem-solving techniques and practice coding challenges.
